TRAINING FEEDBACK & EVALUATAION FORM

Name:{{doc.name}}
Department:{{doc.department}}
Designation:{{doc.des}}
Topic:{{doc.topic}}
Training Type:{{doc.train_type}}




No Of Hours:{{doc.no_of_hours}}
1.0 COURSE CONTENT
1.1 The course content met my key learning objective from this course. {{doc.acc1}}
1.2 The course content was simple and easy to understand {{doc.acc2}}
1.3 I found the contents to be relevant to my work {{doc.acc3}}
1.4 The visual aids(images/graphs/pic/video/ppt)used were very useful {{doc.acc4}}
1.5 The course content is well organized {{doc.acc5}}
2.0 COURSE EXECUTION
2.1 Your interest was kept at a high level throughout the training {{doc.acce1}}
2.2 The activities and examples given were ver useful in understanding the course content {{doc.acce2}}
2.3 The group activities provided a good opportunity to learn from other colleagues {{doc.acce3}}
2.4 Your view on the duration of the training program {{doc.acce4}}
2.5 How do you rate the trainer as overael {{doc.acce5}}
3.0 OUT COMES
3.1 I feel will be able the learning from this course to my work {{doc.acco1}}
3.2 I feel I have completed an important professional development course that will help me in my furture career {{doc.acco2}}
3.3 I feel that the time I have invested in the course have been worthwhile {{doc.acco3}}
4.0 PLEASE FEEL FREE TO MAKE ANY OTHER COMMENTS
4.1 What was your general view of this course ?
{{doc.comm1}}
4.2 What specific things wil you do in your work area as a result of attending this course ?
{{doc.comm2}}
4.3 What improvements would you suggest for the course ?
{{doc.comm3}}
4.4 a) What is your view about the faculty on training ?
{{doc.comm3a}}
b) What is your view on duration of the training ?
{{doc.comm3b}}
4.5 Will the trainer made you comfortable and encouraged your participation throughout the session ?
{{doc.comm4}}
Personal Action Plan:
Three things(skills leading to development of compentencies) I have learnt from this program that i would like to implement in my day to day activities with in 30days.
Date: {{doc.date}}
Signature:


{%- for row in doc.table_58-%} {%- endfor -%}
